metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0858 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cool Projects TarDiff allows local users to write to arbitrary files via asymlink attack on a pathname in a /tmp/tardiff-$$ temporary directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0858` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tardiff - 0.1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tardiff package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.1-4').
